PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The decrease of series resistance could increase FF.

Let's think step by step.

1. Series resistance: This is a property or value that represents the total electrical resistance offered by the series connected components in an electrical circuit.
2. FF: This stands for "figure of merit" or "figure of merit factor" which is a property or value used to evaluate the overall performance of certain types of electronic devices, such as power amplifiers or filters. It is typically a dimensionless quantity that combines several important performance metrics, such as power efficiency, linearity, and bandwidth, into a single number. In the context of the paragraph, it can be assumed that the decrease of series resistance is causing an increase in the figure of merit (FF) of the electrical system or device.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Series resistance: This is a material property or value that represents the total electrical resistance offered by the series connected components in an electrical circuit.
2. Figure of merit (FF): This is a material property or value used to evaluate the overall performance of certain types of electronic devices. It is a dimensionless quantity that combines several important performance metrics, such as power efficiency, linearity, and bandwidth, into a single number.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Series resistance |
| Figure of merit (FF) |
